description: For a new take on steak night, try this steak recipe with quinoa and salad. Scotch fillet, organic quinoa and leafy salad greens are a guaranteed hit.
keywords: Steak,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Jun 2020,Sesame free,Father's Day,May 2020,Microwave,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Steak With Quinoa & Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Coat quinoa in 1 tsp oil in a microwavesafe bowl. Add 11/4 cups cold water, cover with a plate and microwave on high for 5 minutes. Stand, covered, for 5 minutes to steam. Use fork to separate grains.

Heat butter in a large frying pan over high heat until butter begins to foam. Add remaining oil, thyme and garlic and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until aromatic. Push aromatics to one side of pan, then, working in batches, cook steaks for 4 minutes on one side. Turn and cook, basting with butter, for a further 4 minutes for medium rare or until cooked to your liking. Transfer steaks to a plate and cover with foil.
Add lemon juice to pan, stirring to combine. Remove pan from heat. Place beetroot, carrot, radish and salad leaves in a large bowl. Add pan juices, tossing to coat.
Slice steaks, top with thyme from pan and serve with quinoa and salad.
